item.title: Blood Strike Codes (September 2024)
item.description:
Blood Strike is a great online shooter that is unlike other games of the same genre. It is much better and more elaborate. Similar to Warzone Mobile , there are different modes, but Battle Royale is the most popular one. By redeeming Blood Strike codes, you can get cool freebies from the developers that may not give you a significant advantage in battle, but will definitely make you more confident on the battlefield.

Updated September 22, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: Although only one code is available now, a new freebie can appear at any time. So save this guide to stay tuned.

All Blood Strike Codes

As mentioned above, redeeming Blood Strike codes will not give you a significant advantage on the battlefield. Most of the gifts are cosmetic items or resources that will help you upgrade your weapons. Nevertheless, these small upgrades are still nice to get for free.

Active Codes

  • LAUNCHGIFT - Redeem this code to get Glacier Axe.

Expired Codes

  • MARCH21ST - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • TYSTRIKERS - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • LUNARNEWYEAR - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • BLOODSTRIKEFB - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.

How to Redeem Codes in Blood Strike

Redeeming Blood Strike codes is not difficult and will not take much time, but first, you will need to complete the tutorial and finish a match, which will take about 20 minutes in total. Some codes are limited, and only a certain number of players can use them, so redeem them as soon as possible to avoid missing out.

  • Launch Blood Strike .
  • In the main menu, on the left side of the screen, you will see several buttons. Among them, interact with the lowest one, which says Event.
  • After doing this, you will be taken to a menu with information about various announcements or events that are currently taking place in the game.
  • Here, on the left side of the screen, you will see a section with different buttons, among which you will need to interact with the penultimate one, where the speaker is depicted on the icon.
  • After doing so, you will open a drop-down menu with different tabs.
  • From here, scroll down until you see the button labeled Redemption Code, then click on it.
  • This will take you to the redemption page, where you will see an input field and a Confirm button.
  • Now, enter manually, or better yet, copy and paste one of the above active codes into the input field.
  • Next, click on the yellow Confirm button to submit your reward request.
  • If everything goes well, you will see a notification on the screen that you have received rewards.

Thus, you must redeem all active codes to get all the relevant rewards. Keep in mind that each code has a limited number of uses, and you may not manage to redeem it in time and thus miss out on rewards.

Blood Strike is available on mobile.

item.title: God Of War Ragnarok: Best Shields, Ranked
item.description:
Sometimes the best offense is a strong defense, and God of War Ragnarok presents plenty of options with the 6 shields available. Players can access six shields in God of War Ragnarok , each with their own advantages and disadvantages to complement or hinder the playstyle of every fan who steps into the shoes of Kratos himself.

The best shields in God of War Ragnarok depend on specific playstyles, but with every shield ranked, it might be easier for players to decide which shield they want to invest in, as the locations and effects of all shields in God of War Ragnarok are listed below to show which is the best of the best.

6 Shatter Star Shield

Found in a Legendary Chest in The Abandoned Village, Vanaheim

  • Shield Punch: Double Tap L1 to Shield Punch and blow enemies backward, increasing in power when fully charged.
  • Hold L1 to charge up your shield. Blocking an attack depletes some charge. Shield Punch right before an attack hits you to absorb it and gain a burst of charge.

The Shatter Star Shield is an interesting one, as it benefits players who like to stay mobile and keep patient as they charge up an attack for some increased power. The Shatter Star Shield can use a Shield Punch, which blows enemies backward and can be further charged up to create a harsh amount of damage.

This defensive shield is fun for its ranged capabilities, but it might hold players back a tad due to its lack of aggression, and to charge it, players must hold back from the fight.

5 Onslaught Shield

Found in a Legendary Chest After Fighting Garm in Helheim, or Purchased For 7,500 Hacksilver

  • Shield Rush: Double Tap L1 to Shield Rush forward into an enemy while Blocking incoming attacks.
  • Use from a greater distance to Launch enemies on impact.

The Onslaught Shield is reserved for those who prefer a defensive approach, as this bulky shield is able to negate most damage from enemies by blocking their advancement. Yet, there is still room for an aggressive playstyle with the Onslaught Shield.

The Shield Rush ability allows players to charge forward and block damage while they are doing so, and reaching their targets will see them strike forward with thunderous fury. It’s a fun shield for those who prefer defensive capabilities, but it lacks the fluid style of a parry shield.

4 Stone Wall Shield

Crafted at the Huldra Brothers’ Workshop

  • Shield Slam: Double Tap L1 to Shield Slam, Launching enemies when fully charged. Block attacks to absorb the hit and build up charge.
  • Guard-break (yellow ring) attacks can be Blocked when not fully charged.

Sometimes, parrying just isn’t the style players want, so the Stone Wall Shield makes for the perfect answer to that. With the Stone Wall Shield, players can absorb attacks and even strike back without the fear of messing up a Parry.

The Stone Wall Shield uses the Shield Slam effect, which allows players to charge the shield by blocking attacks to then slam it into the ground. It’s a highly defensive shield for those who just want to block damage, including yellow ring attacks.

3 Dauntless Shield

Crafted at the Huldra Brothers’ Workshop

  • Shield Bash: Double Tap L1 to Shield Bash for high Stun damage.
  • Parry: (Press L1 right before getting hit) to deal Stun to the attacker and empower your next Shield Bash. Time the Parry perfectly to significantly improve this effect.

The Dauntless Shield benefits from a high-risk and high-reward playstyle due to its reliance on parries. It’s the shield to use for players who want to practice parrying, or for those who have already mastered it with their ultimate reflexes.

The Dauntless Shield requires players to parry, for the block will do nothing but stun Kratos after one strike. With the Dauntless Shield, players are gifted higher Stun damage on enemies with the Shield Bash and upon a Parry, but it requires a fast input that some players might mess up.

2 Guardian Shield

Unlocked in Main Quest: The Word of Fate

  • Shield Check: Double Tap L1 to quickly Shield Check an enemy and break their guard.
  • Parry: (Press L1 right before getting hit) to deal Stun to the attacker and empower your next Shield Bash. Time the Parry perfectly to significantly improve this effect.

The Guardian Shield is a classic, so it’s hard not to rank this one higher. Not only is there a loving reminder for Kratos with the Guardian Shield because of his deceased wife, Faye, but it’s also a decent shield for familiar engagements in combat.

The ability to Shield Check and Parry is going to allow players the most versatile shield, as it can negate blue ring attacks and parry to provide strong counterattacks with a generous window.

1 Spartan Aspis

Crafted at the Huldra Brothers’ Workshop in New Game Plus

  • A form of the Guardian Shield with a much smaller Parry window but stronger special counterattacks.
  • Shield Check: Double Tap L1 to quickly Shield Check an enemy and break their guard.
  • Parry: (Press L1 right before getting hit) to deal Stun to the attacker and empower your next Shield Bash. Time the Parry perfectly to significantly improve this effect.

The Spartan Aspis shield has a distinct visual style that combines Kratos’ Spartan past with the Guardian Shield. The best visuals, and arguably the best shield for the most skilled players, the Spartan Aspis is reliable thanks to its Shield Check and Parry, but it also has an element of risk due to the smaller Parry window.

Yet, with a stronger special counterattack when using the Parry, the Spartan Aspis proves the strength and brutality in every attack from Kratos, and since it can only be unlocked in New Game Plus, players should have mastered the Parry by then.

item.title: Ghost of Tsushima 2 Can't Afford to Beat Around the Bush Much Longer
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • Fans have been eagerly awaiting the announcement of a Ghost of Tsushima sequel.
  • Various rumors and leaks have suggested a sequel is in development since the first game's success.
  • With Secret Level premiering soon, it's the perfect opportunity for Ghost of Tsushima 2 to be revealed.

At this point, it's verging on comical more than worrisome that a Ghost of Tsushima sequel has yet to be announced. After all, it makes more sense to assume a Ghost of Tsushima sequel is in development than to assume the opposite is true, as the massive success of the first game and the numerous rumors and leaks surrounding the development of a sequel all but confirm its existence. Ghost of Tsushima surprised the gaming community with its breathtaking visuals, engaging combat, and satisfying stealth mechanics, and its arrival during the initial COVID-19 outbreak only helped it soar to success. As such, Sucker Punch would be leaving money on the table not to move forward with a sequel.

Despite the extreme likelihood that a Ghost of Tsushima sequel is in development, it still can't afford to continue keeping its fans in limbo. Even Borderlands knew when to admit that the jig was up and recently decided to announce Borderlands 4 , much to the excitement of fans. In the same way, it's high time Ghost of Tsushima 's sequel confirms what everyone is already assuming anyway, especially in light of the first game's inclusion in the upcoming anthology series Secret Level .

It's Time for Ghost of Tsushima's Sequel to Show Itself

Ghost of Tsushima 2 Has Been a Long Time Coming

It has now been a little over four years since the release of Ghost of Tsushima , meaning a sequel reveal has been a long time coming. That wait has felt even longer with the various rumors and leaks that have surfaced concerning a potential sequel, and it all began with a job posting that was discovered just a few months after Ghost of Tsushima ’s initial launch. Since then, other rumors and reported leaks have circulated, suggesting a Ghost of Tsushima sequel could be revealed at any moment.

Unfortunately, even after four years' worth of seemingly credible sources leaking an impending Ghost of Tsushima sequel reveal, nothing has come of it. There have even been several opportunities in the last couple of years for a Ghost of Tsushima 2 reveal, including various PlayStation showcases. However, Sucker Punch never jumped on those opportunities for some reason only the developer knows, assuming the sequel is indeed in development. There is one other variable to consider, which comes back to an announcement Sony made earlier this year that it would not be releasing any major existing franchises before April 2025. That doesn't mean a reveal is out of the question though.

The Release of Secret Level Is the Perfect Time for a Ghost of Tsushima 2 Reveal

Around a month ago, Amazon Prime Video released a teaser trailer for Tim Miller's Secret Level , an animated anthology series set in the world of a variety of different video games. While Ghost of Tsushima isn't included in the list of games shown at the end of the trailer, there is a split-second image of Jin Sakai that is very easy to miss. In light of that, Ghost of Tsushima may receive an episode in the series, or at least a cameo. If that turns out to be true, there is no reason Ghost of Tsushima 2 should pass up what could be yet another opportunity for a big reveal.

With Secret Level premiering on December 10 and Sony's announcement that it would not be releasing any major existing franchise before April 2025, December would be the perfect time for a Ghost of Tsushima 2 announcement, followed by an April 2025 release. It's high time Ghost of Tsushima 2 takes advantage of one of these valuable opportunities and reveals itself for once. The fans have now waited long enough for a confirmation of some kind, so Ghost of Tsushima 2 can't afford to beat around the bush much longer.

item.title: New York Times Strands Hints and Answers for September 23, 2024
item.description:
Quick Links

  • The NYT Games Strands Puzzle #204 September 23, 2024
  • New York Times Games Strands Clues
  • Spoilers for Two of the Words in Today's Strands
  • The Answer to Today's New York Times Games Strands
  • Today's Strands Explained

Every day, the New York Times Games presents yet another Strands puzzle, a word-search puzzle that doesn't hand you any of the words you are going to be looking for. You need to use every single letter once, and you only have one clue to go on.

But today's puzzle is even more challenging than the rules of how to play Strands might suggest; there are some difficult words hidden inside the grid of letters. If you are looking for help with this one, you can find tons of clues below.

The NYT Games Strands Puzzle #204 September 23, 2024

The Strands puzzle for today has the clue Gnaw-It-Alls . There are six words to find: one Spangram and five themed words.

New York Times Games Strands Clues

In each of the three sections below, you can find one clue to the theme for this mobile puzzle game. None of them contain any of the answers, just general hints to get you closer to the topic of today's puzzle.

General Hint 1

General Hint 2

General Hint 3

Spoilers for Two of the Words in Today's Strands

In the two sections below are individual spoilers for today's Strands . Open them up to glimpse the word as well as its position inside the puzzle.

Spoiler 1

Spoiler 2

The Answer to Today's New York Times Games Strands

The full answer to this difficult puzzle game is in the section below. Open it up to see all the themed words, the Spangram, and a screenshot of where each of those words belongs in the letter grid.

Today's Strands Explained

Don't get the puzzle today? In the section below, you can find the explanation for how the Spangram, the themed words, and the clue all go together in this New York Times Games Strands puzzle.

Want to play? Check out the New York Times Games Strands website available on almost any device with a browser.

item.title: Roblox: Ninja Legends Codes (September 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Ninja Legends Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Ninja Legends
  • Ninja Legends Tips and Tricks
  • The Best Roblox Fighting Games Like Ninja Legends
  • About the Ninja Legends Developers

This article is perfect for Roblox players who are looking for a source of Ninja Legends codes. Almost all of them offer a valuable in-game currency: Chi. The developers generously reward Roblox players for redeeming codes in Ninja Legends allowing them to save a lot of time on farming.

Updated September 22, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: This guide has been updated to include all the new codes. If you haven't redeemed your freebies yet, now is the time.

All Ninja Legends Codes

Hurry up and redeem all the codes in Ninja Legends . The developers add quite a few of them, but they also make old codes inactive.

Codes Checked on September 22, 2024.

Working Ninja Legends Codes

Expired Ninja Legends Codes

  • goldninja500 - Enter this code to get 500 Chi.
  • Chisilentshadows1000 - Enter this code to get 1000 Chi.

How to Redeem Codes in Ninja Legends

Just like in many other Roblox games, redeeming codes in Ninja Legends is a simple task. Players can follow the instructions below to do so:

  • Open Roblox and launch Ninja Legends .
  • Find the blue “Codes” icon on the main screen of the game.
  • Click on this icon.
  • Enter the offered code in the field that says "Type Code Here."

Ninja Legends Tips and Tricks

Below are some valuable tips and tricks for Ninja Legends :

  • Consider using an auto-clicker tool to automate clicking and progress in the game.
  • Optimize gameplay by positioning between the shop and the selling area to upgrade weapons and earn coins efficiently.
  • Level up pets by participating in activities such as King of the Hill, attacking bosses, and running through circles or hoops.
  • Search various chests scattered throughout the game to collect additional rewards.

The Best Roblox Fighting Games Like Ninja Legends

In addition to fighting, Ninja Legends players have to grind quite a bit to save up for new weapons and such. Suppose they have already gotten the best weapon and have developed their characters as much as possible. In that case, they may want to play other games that offer a similar experience. For those who find themselves in this position, these fantastic fighting games like Ninja Legends should help to scratch the itch:

  • Fireball Punching Simulator
  • Blox Fruits
  • Dragon Blox
  • A One Piece Game
  • Rogue Demon

About the Ninja Legends Developers

Scriptbloxian Studios is a very productive development team that has already released 5 cool games. Their group in Roblox has more than 20 million members.
